version_description: Bug fixes.

· Social Gallery Redesign – Check out our newly redesigned Social Gallery to view great beauty inspirations and share your favorite looks!
· New Branding – Color and font updates to provide a consistent look and feel throughout the app.
· Passbook – You can now add your Ulta Rewards card to your Passbook to use for in-store purchases.
· Apple Watch app enhancements.
· iPhone 6 and 6 Plus optimization.
· Fixed the Empty Bag & Favorite issue.
· Bug and performance fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

· Now supports Apple Pay* to check out with a single touch!
· Use 'em, don't lose 'em! Know when your Ultamate Rewards points expire
· View free gift with purchase details including qualifying purchase info
· Performance enhancements & bug fixes

* Compatible with iOS 9.0 and above; American Express, MasterCard, and Visa accepted
· Minor enhancements and bug fixes

· Feel the love! Signing up for Ulta Beauty’s FREE Ultamate Rewards Program is now easier than ever
· Gift gorgeously! Now send eGift Cards or Gift Cards by mail from your mobile device
· Learn more & apply for the Ultamate Rewards Credit Card – another exciting way that beauty loves you back!
· Conveniently manage your Ultamate Rewards Credit Card account from your mobile device
· Enhancements to the Ulta Beauty app’s existing Apple Pay integration
· Bug fixes & performance enhancements for an even more beautiful shopping experience

· Easily find a product using the improved scanner to view product info, ratings, reviews & save your favorites; QR codes now supported!
· Opt-in for push notifications to be the first to know about exclusive offers on your favorite products & brands, as well as upcoming events at your nearest Ulta Beauty store
· We love our Platinum Members! Shop Platinum level exclusive products and offers ("Platinum Perk”)
· Search for and quickly find recently viewed products using Spotlight Search (on iOS 9+)
· Bug fixes & performance enhancements for an even more beautiful shopping experience

· Scroll through a product’s new color picker to explore its full range of colors, or tap to the color list to quickly find your signature shade
· Book an appointment at your nearest Ulta Beauty Salon in a snap! Treat yourself to beauty services for hair, skin & more
· Explore the Ulta Beauty Mix for the latest on what’s making our hearts race, along with beauty tips, articles and how-to’s
· Sign up for back-in-stock emails to be the first to know when your most-wanted product makes its comeback
· Bug fixes & performance enhancements for an even more beautiful shopping experience

Introducing Ulta Beauty GLAMlab, a virtual beauty try-on experience!
○ Use a selfie to play with makeup on your own face, or pick a model
○ Virtually try on our favorites for eyes, lips, and cheeks from top brands including Urban Decay and NYX (with much more coming soon!)
○ Two ways to try it on:
• Create complex virtual looks like a makeup pro! Layer products, explore palettes, blend shades, and play with intensity with the stroke of your finger
• Or, virtually apply products on the quick with just a tap; try on hundreds of colors in minutes – no swatching or cleanup required!
○ Discovering and comparing products and colors is super easy – add them to your favorites or to your bag
○ Gorgeously real virtual effects! Matte, shimmer, luminous, and color shifting finishes look just as they do IRL
○ Share your finished look socially, and save it to your photos
○ Friendly and fun for ALL skin tones!

New Features & Bug Fixes:
○ We fixed it! Once again, zoom in on product images to get an up-close view
○ Improved, high-res product images give you a pixel-perfect view; plus, zoom in to see every detail
○ Book an appointment at your nearest Ulta Beauty Salon in a snap! Treat yourself to beauty services for hair, skin & more
○ Explore the Ulta Beauty Mix for the latest on what’s making our hearts race, along with beauty tips, articles and how-to’s

Introducing Ulta Beauty GLAMlab, a virtual beauty try-on experience!
○ Use a selfie or pick a model to virtually try on our makeup favorites for eyes, lips, and cheeks
○ Create complex virtual looks like a makeup pro or apply products on the quick with just a tap!

Recent Bug Fixes:
○ Fixed an issue when using PayPal to checkout
○ Once again, zoom in on product images to get an up-close view
We’ve put a little polish on things behind the scenes (bug fixes, app improvements, and such). Stay tuned, because we’ll really glitz things up with new features soon!

We’ve put a little polish on things behind the scenes (bug fixes, app improvements, and such). Stay tuned, because we’ll really glitz things up with new features soon! This release also includes a fix for iPhone 5 and 5c guests.

○ Use voice search to search for a brand or product, simply by speaking its name
○ Search even faster with type-ahead, which suggests brands and products as you type
○ View and select from your recent searches to easily pick up where you left off
○ Use the updated store locator to get directions to your nearest Ulta Beauty store, view hours, & even book a Salon appointment
○ Bug fixes & performance enhancements for an even more beautiful shopping experience

Please note that future releases will only support 64 bit devices (iPhone 5s & newer) running iOS 9.3 and above.

• Arriving May 7, find MAC Cosmetics in GLAMlab, Ulta's virtual beauty try-on experience!
• Use voice search to search for a brand or product, simply by speaking its name
• Search even faster with type-ahead, which suggests brands and products as you type
• View and select from your recent searches to easily pick up where you left off
• Use the updated store locator to get directions to your nearest Ulta Beauty store, view hours, & even book a Salon appointment!
• Bug fixes & performance enhancements for an even more beautiful shopping experience
• Please note that our future releases will only support 64 bit devices (iPhone 5s and newer) running iOS 9.3 and higher.

Our home screen got a gorgeous makeover! Now you can:
• More easily view & access your Ultamate Rewards bonus offers, current status, and points balance
• Shop our biggest events, latest promotions, and newest arrivals, all from the home screen
• Swipe & scroll through the hottest beauty trends and looks for inspiration
• Use the shortcut menu to quickly navigate through the app

Got a gift card? Store it in the app, then pull it up during checkout to redeem it on your purchase!

Additionally, we included some bug fixes and performance enhancements for an even more beautiful shopping experience.

Please note that this release is available for 64 bit devices (iPhone 5s and newer) running iOS 9.3 and higher. If your device is running the iOS 11 public beta, please be aware that our app is not yet fully supporting iOS 11.

Our home screen got a gorgeous makeover! Now you can:
• More easily view & access your Ultamate Rewards bonus offers, current status, and points balance
• Shop our biggest events, latest promotions, and newest arrivals, all from the home screen
• Swipe & scroll through the hottest beauty trends and looks for inspiration
• Use the shortcut menu to quickly navigate through the app

Got a gift card? Store it in the app, then pull it up during checkout to redeem it on your purchase!

Additionally, we included some bug fixes (especially a few for iOS 9 & 11) and performance enhancements for an even more beautiful shopping experience.

Please note that this release is available for 64 bit devices (iPhone 5s and newer) running iOS 9.3 and higher. If your device is running the iOS 11 public beta, please be aware that our app is not yet fully supporting iOS 11.

We’ve made some beautiful (and bold!) changes to our bag and checkout experience:
• Checkout is quicker than ever, now just a single page with less steps
• Available gifts with purchase are automatically added to your order
• More product info (including color, size, and scent) is now provided in the bag
• Checking out as a guest? Add your Ultamate Rewards member ID and never miss out on points

Our app also has been enhanced to support iOS 11. Please note that this release is available for 64 bit devices (iPhone 5s and newer) running iOS 9.3 and higher.

We’ve made some beautiful (and bold!) changes to our bag and checkout experience:
• Checkout is quicker than ever, now just a single page with less steps
• Available gifts with purchase are automatically added to your order
• More product info (including color, size, and scent) is now provided in the bag
• Checking out as a guest? Add your Ultamate Rewards member ID and never miss out on points

Our app also has been enhanced to support iOS 11. Please note that this release is available for 64 bit devices (iPhone 5s and newer) running iOS 9.3 and higher.

• Introducing Diamond, the new & highest level of Ultamate Rewards. It's the ultimate tier for guests who live, breathe, and love beauty - a program full of brilliant, new benefits to dazzle and delight!
• GLAMlab has been updated with all new models representative of a wider variety of skin tones, complexions, and face/features shapes
• Need to shop MAC foundations and Lancôme mascara, but unsure which Ulta Beauty location carries which brands? Now refine by brand in our Store Locator to simplify planning your next visit
• Apple Pay can now be used to purchase plastic gift cards or e-gift cards, making it easier than ever to give the gift of beauty
• iPhone X users: Enjoy an improved visual experience that takes full advantage of the unique display of the iPhone X

*Please note that this release is available for 64 bit devices (iPhone 5s and newer) running iOS 9.3 and higher.

Our New GLAMlab experience is more fabulous than ever!

• Play, explore, discover—now it's easy to experiment with thousands of makeup shades & create unexpected looks! Just snap a selfie & use our new filter capabilities to search by brand, color, finish & form.
• Our product shades are for real. All of them have been calibrated & verified so the colors you see on screen are super accurate on you.

We fixed some pesky bugs to create a more beautiful Ulta Beauty app experience.
We fixed some pesky bugs and added some performance enhancements to create a more beautiful Ulta Beauty app experience.
We fixed some pesky bugs and added some performance enhancements to create a more beautiful Ulta Beauty app experience.

• We freshened up our product pages behind the scenes—now it's easier than ever to find your beauty faves. Enjoy faster speeds and searchability. Plus, we fixed some bugs (across our whole app, too).
• Skip the surprises! View your estimated tax amount before you enter your shipping address and keep your beauty budget in line.
• We’re officially PCI compliant—which means a more secure shopping experience for you. We’ve got your personal info on lock, and that is always a beautiful thing.
We freshened up our product pages behind the scenes—now it's easier than ever to find your beauty faves. Enjoy faster speeds and searchability. Plus, we fixed some bugs (across our whole app, too).

• Forget your password? It happens. Now you can reset it for your app in a snap. Our new password reset email contains all the details you need to complete a successful reset.
• You can also send the password reset link to yourself without entering your username—and get your username sent to you without resetting your password.
• We fixed some pesky production bugs to make your in-app shopping experience a smooth one. Enjoy!

What’s New!
• Easily find your coupons, offers and messages in your refreshed Inbox.
• Personalized content! On the home tab, you’ll see new info about your order status, current offers and your favorite categories and products.
• Virtual Foundation Shade Matcher to get matched to a foundation that best matches your skin tone.
• Virtually try on products directly from the product page to see how that shade looks on you.
• Changes to our navigation that will help you explore all the new features.
• Fixes to some production bugs for a seamless shopping experience. Enjoy!

•Save your faves for later! Now you can keep items you love in your cart and move them to your bag when you're ready to purchase for fast, no-fuss checkout.
•Check out the improved GLAMlab virtual try-on experience—now in live mode. Play around with thousands of products in real time and try looks without the commitment.
•We fixed some production bugs across our whole app for a more seamless shopping experience. Enjoy!

•Save your faves for later! Now you can keep items you love in your cart and move them to your bag when you're ready to purchase for fast, no-fuss checkout.
•Check out the improved GLAMlab virtual try-on experience—now in live mode. Play around with thousands of products in real time and try looks without the commitment.
•We fixed some production bugs across our whole app for a more seamless shopping experience. Enjoy!

• We freshened up our GLAMlab virtual try-on experience for iOS users. Experiment with new makeup looks right from your device.
• Need info about a past order? We’ve revamped our Order History and Order Details section so it’s easy to find what you’re looking for fast.
• See even more product images when you shop in the app. Swipe left for fresh photos and content from your favorite products (and ones you want to try).
• We fixed some production bugs across our app for a seamless shopping. Enjoy!

• We freshened up our GLAMlab virtual try-on experience for iOS users. Experiment with new makeup looks right from your device.

• Buy Online & Pick Up in Store is here—it’s fast, easy and totally free. Place your pickup orders in the app to get the beauty you love in an instant.
• Have a pickup store in mind? Our Store Availability feature shows if the item you are viewing is available to Buy Online & Pickup in Store.
• We fixed some production bugs in our app for a seamless shopping experience. Enjoy!

We’ve improved our Ultamate Rewards experience:
• Access your bonus offers, messages and birthday treats from the homepage.
• Track your points and journey to Platinum or Diamond status.
• Get your offers and messages all in one place-activate and shop instantly.

Ace your base and try on foundation in our GLAMlab: a virtual try-on experience.

We fixed some production bugs across our app for a seamless shopping experience. Enjoy!

What’s New!
• Now you can checkout with Afterpay! We love this new payment option because it allows you to enjoy your order right away, then pay for it in four equal installments, interest-free. Sign up and start shopping!
• We fixed some production bugs across our app for a seamless shopping experience. Enjoy!

New year, new possibilities! We’ve updated our loyalty program starting in the new year and don’t want you to miss out! Spend $500 in a calendar year to reach Platinum status and get our latest Rewards Dashboard to see how you’re tracking.

• Introducing: Personalized routines! Get a custom-made skincare regimen based on your goals and preferences using the Skin Analysis tool.
• Check and see how busy your Ulta Beauty store is before you head in to shop. Available only in the app under the Stores tab. And, you can now see the services your Ulta Beauty store has to offer.
